title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: April 01, 2023, 06:15:34 AMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 04:41:45 PM by Royse777
content: ABOUT THE CAMPAIGNSinbad.io is re-launching their signature campaign on bitcointalk. If you are a campaign participants from the last campaign then you do not need to apply. You are automatically added to this new campaign.As the campaign manager, I hold 5 BTC (≈ $141,300) in escrow to guarantee payment for members. Sinbad management will top up the address occasionally when there will not have enough to pay the coming weeks. ESCROW INFORMATIONPrivate (Only accepted members are allowed to check)CAMPAIGN REWARDS 30* Legendary: $10.00 per post up to 30 posts each week.25* Hero: $8.00 per post up to 30 posts each week.20* Sr. Member: $6.00 per post up to 30 posts each week.15* Full Member: $5:00 per post up to 30 posts each week.Total 90 members.3 best posters will receive $50 each every week.The management will appreciate if you volunteer some sort of customer support on behalf of them when absence on SINBAD MIXER ANN threadPREVENT AI DOMINATIONThis campaign is protected by Prevent AI Domination terms defined here:ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty. ▶ï¸ If I find campaign members breaching these terms, I will remove them from the campaign immediately. ▶ï¸ If you find AI-written posts for this campaign and report them to me publicly or via PM, you will receive the weekly payment instead of the accused campaigner (if your report was successful). Please include as much evidence as possible when submitting a report.CAMPAIGN RULES▶ï¸ Wear the appropriate signature and avatar during the campaign▶ï¸ Minimum of five posts a week to be eligible to receive payment.▶ï¸ Maximum 5 posts on local boards (exception in Russian section: Max 20) will be counted for payments▶ï¸ Posts must be minimum of 150 characters long and constructive▶ï¸ Posts in the following boards/sections are not eligible: "Off-Topic", "Archival, Games & Rounds", "Investor-Based Games", "Wall Observers", "Serious Discussion", "Altcoin Discussion", "Lending", "Press", "Politics & Society", other signature campaign threads, including this one, any ANN threads (Sinbad ANN and ANN posted on the "Gambling" board are allowed), and areas where the signature is not visible▶ï¸ No valid negative from DT network unless pre-approved by me▶ï¸ You must have minimum five merits in the last 120 days▶ï¸ Join my Telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAIMPORTANT INFORMATION▶ï¸ You are not allowed to change anything on the signature code. If you edit the signature code, I will disqualify you immediately▶ï¸ I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign, or edit any rules of this campaign▶ï¸ The week starts on Sunday and ends on Saturday (UTC)▶ï¸ Please check the spreadsheet comment column and your payment information regularly.▶ï¸ To access spreadsheet you will need to provide me a Gmail email address via PM (Only for accepted participants)▶ï¸ When accepted then please provide me a bech32 address via forum PMHOW TO APPLYReply to this thread with the following informationCode:Current number of posts (including this one):Rank:Merit earned in the last 120 days:..SPREADSHEET (Only for campaign participants, require email address)..AVATARLink :
